channel.title: PI How could I set the gameframe
channel.description: The source is Vistex. if anyone knows how to set the gameframe automatically for login to 474, that'd be nice. I changed the sprites to the older gameframe but the actual frame's buttons are 562. and the problem is, my cache i don't think has the older(474) sprites and idk if the client has the codes in there to use them.

item.title: PI How could I set the gameframe
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

justinmperry:

The source is Vistex. if anyone knows how to set the gameframe automatically for login to 474, that’d be nice. I changed the sprites to the older gameframe but the actual frame’s buttons are 562. and the problem is, my cache i don’t think has the older(474) sprites and idk if the client has the codes in there to use them.

At the log in method (Must be PlayerAssistant):
[java=5]
setGameframe();
[/java]
I’m not sure how the method is exactly called at vistex, find out by searching it (if added…)

Read full topic
item.source: PI How could I set the gameframe
